channel.title: Gross-margins on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Gross Margin
item.description: Overview Here you can see the details about Profit & Loss’ gross margin for each month of the current year. A project’s gross margin is the difference between its revenues and its external costs. Three important indicators are given in the first rows: Total: the sum of all your projects’ gross margin, per month Bluesky: the difference between revenues’ bluesky and external costs’ bluesky Delta revenues target: the difference between revenues’ delta revenues target and external costs’ delta revenues target
